properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parloka sainyamaa parama thandri Mahimanu paraakrama kriyalu Telpedamu raarandi parishuddha Devuni goppa kaaryamul parishuddha Kaaryamu prakatinthumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahaatnyamu galgina devundaru Denchenu mahimanu vidachi Naruduga janminche aha siluvalo Saataanunu jayinche bahaatamugaa Rakshana nosage manaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thappi poti milalo gorrelanu Boliyu thappu lenno chesi Shiksharhula maitimi arpinchenu Praanamu manchi kaapari yai Goppa rakshana nitchi uddarinchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aadaamu nandu poye devuni Mahaatmyamu andhula mai yuntimi Ajnaanula maithimi naadhu desu nandu Ponditimi velugu adhika maina Jnaana mahimalosage{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapamutho nindina paapi Nede raarammu paapa phalithamu Maranamu sahintuvaa paapula Rakshakudesu rakshimpa nilache Thappu loppukonumu ninnu rakshinchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pradhaanula kantenu adhikaarula Kanna adhikudu prabhuvu raajya Mela vachchunu andariki prabhuvu Shirassai yunnaadu andaramu Paadedamu Halleluya paata{/lang-eng}
